descriptionHtml:
this changes the look to Darkelves
i added brand new..
.Mouths
.Brows
.Eyes
.Noses
I made them younger but the males still have their normal face unfortunately maybe in the future i will fix this :)
i also decided to Include one of my older mods
\"Dark Elf Skin Revamped\" as an edition 

Recommended Mods
Enhanced Character Edit by:tktk1
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951

ANY hair mods mine are listed below

Apachii Sky Hair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168

Hair Packs of Fallout3
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17993

Hair Packs of TES IV Oblivion
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110

LovelyHairstyles
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7403

How To Install
i recommend the SMM (Skyrim Mod Manager) but pretty much you just put the esp inside the skyrim data folder then activate it if you don\'t want it anymore then...

How To Uninstall 
remove the esp

CREDITS
all the authors of the hair mods

Bethesda for Dark Elves and skyrim

All my downloaders :)

tktk1 for the pretty character mod
author: Vintage9
